snippet: With an 18-point victory over Duke, North Carolina easily won the A.C.C. regular-season title and proved why it is a national championship contender.
abstract: With an 18-point victory over Duke, North Carolina easily won the A.C.C. regular-season title and proved why it is a national championship contender.

headline.main: In Rivalry With Duke, Tar Heels Erase All Doubt
